name: ANTS on CONDOR
short_description:
*** NOTE: Any further updates or debugging will be made through github. 
Please go to: https://github.com/solleo/ANTs-Condor
- SG (2014-07-22)

Advanced Normalization Tools (ANTS; https://sourceforge.net/projects/advants/) is an extremely sophisticated image registration tool, which is often used in human neuroimaging analysis. 

As creating an unbiased study-specific template with a large number of subjects is highly demanding in computational load, parallelization is implemented in ANTS's script "buildtemplateparallel.sh" for SGE, PBS and Apple XGrid, but not for Condor yet.

This modification enables running  buildtemplateparallel.sh from ANTS-1.9.v4 on HTCondor (http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/) environment.
summary: Using buildtemplateparallel.sh from ANTS on Condor
